pageContext.claim: “ 'The word is you had a heart attack. CNN said you may have had a heart attack. You had massive chest pains. You went to the hospital.' These people are sick. They're sick. And the press really, in this country, is dangerous.”
pageContext.analysis: CNN had previously reported that “the President had a moderate risk of a heart attack in the following 3-5 years,” according to guidance from the Mayo Clinic for patients with his form of heart disease.
